channel.title: A ::roll command
channel.description: ok. how do i make a command which makes me shout out (not ::yell) a random number between one and one hundred? ive got this [code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { Psay("playerName + misc.random(999999);") [/code] but this dont work. help? :confused:

item.title: A ::roll command
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

i followd what zammy did. can you add it to your server, get a pic then show me?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2007, 06:59:04 AM[/size][hr]woot i got it finnaly!
the code is:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { int tempo1 = misc.random(100); txt4 = " "+tempo1; string4UpdateRequired = true;

Read full topic

item.title: A ::roll command
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:1, topic:61549”][quote author=2hnderspeckr link=topic=87962.msg930419#msg930419 date=1172191677]
ok.
how do i make a command which makes me shout out (not ::yell) a random number between one and one hundred?
ive got this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { Psay("playerName + misc.random(999999);") but this dont work. help?
[/quote]
* Zero to teh rescue
Answer: Wrong syntax.
Fix:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("roll")) { int tempo1 = misc.random(100); Psay(playerName+": "+tempo); } [/quote]

YEY!!!??!? zero is here
ty im trying it now

playerName2 = playerName.toUpperCase();

@sonjichan wrote:

Well beside this point. I have a running Burning crusade emu server that my clan plays on also, but we’re not developing that since it’s easy to update, as WoW just simply gives away the files needed to run it. lol… what great guys… it’s like World of Warcraft encourages you to learn about it… anyway I need to quit spamming. I’d suggest looking up more of what that person posted before me.

item.title: A ::roll command
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

lol[quote=“sonjichan, post:8, topic:61019”] I agree completely. My server is quite traditional so to speak, no special things aside from the fact that players
on my server, can create special buildings and facilities. We’re in the process right now of building a new city where Zanaris is. Everyone on my server has access to a ftp which hosts the files for the server, they are also all admins, this is because we are working collectively every hour on the hour to repair, enhance, and modify the server, if I’m not fixing problems then one of my clansmen are. That’s why we’re so rapidly making this server bug free, but back to the point. I like your concept, you should make an anti-ninja command for people who steal drops haha. :)[/quote]

better use my beserker rage before the rat ownz me XD

maybe i should make world of warcraft weapons, and start getting killed by a cow which uses his feet!
trust me they hurt… only hitting 1 damadge… which k.os me XD

NO!?!??!?!?!? -50dkp!@!?!?!?!??!?!? darn stuipid server

Read full topic

item.title: A ::roll command
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

I agree completely. My server is quite traditional so to speak, no special things aside from the fact that players
on my server, can create special buildings and facilities. We’re in the process right now of building a new city where Zanaris is. Everyone on my server has access to a ftp which hosts the files for the server, they are also all admins, this is because we are working collectively every hour on the hour to repair, enhance, and modify the server, if I’m not fixing problems then one of my clansmen are. That’s why we’re so rapidly making this server bug free, but back to the point. I like your concept, you should make an anti-ninja command for people who steal drops haha.

Read full topic
